actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide for the cancellation of outstanding principal of certain national defense education loans for service prior to June 30, 1970, in the Armed Forces of the United States.
short_title: National Defense Loan Armed Forces Service Act

summary.text: National Defense Loan Armed Forces Service Act - Authorizes the cancellation of up to 50 percent of the outstanding principal of national defense higher education loans for individuals who were in service in the Armed Forces prior to June 30, 1970.

titles.title: National Defense Loan Armed Forces Service Act
A bill to provide for the cancellation of outstanding principal of certain national defense education loans for service prior to June 30, 1970, in the Armed Forces of the United States.
